comprehensive_overview: ncurses is a programming library that provides an API that allows the programmer to write text-based user interfaces in a terminal-independent manner.
core_features: 1. Provides functions for moving the cursor, managing windows, handling mouse input, and displaying text in color. 2. Allows the design of text-based user interfaces with panels, menus, and forms. 3. Supports multiple terminal types and terminal emulators. 4. Enables the creation of interactive console applications with a modern look and feel.
